remarks: The base set of a constructed two-slot structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
statement:
2str.g $e |- G = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( E ` ndx ) , .+ >. } $.
2str.e $e |- E = Slot N $.
2str.l $e |- 1 < N $.
2str.n $e |- N e. NN $.
2strbas $p |- ( B e. V -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) $.
